instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message:
Hello guys,
I have bust noticed a strange behavior. I can normal work on MBA 1466, battery is charging and there is an orange light on the charger. However, when I shut down laptop, the orange light on the charger turns off. This does not look like normal, but MBA works normal.
What could it be?

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message:
Magsafe light stays off, when machine turns off?
Any 820-xxxx code available?

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message:
It is the same <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A board on which EMC1414 temperature monitoring chip is removed. When laptop is powered ON, LED on Magsafe becomes first green for a sec then orange. When Laptop is turned off, this LED also turns off. Battery is charging OK when laptop is ON.

Maybe it has something to do with <CHIP>U5810</CHIP> removed, but not sure.

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message: Did you try another original Magsafe 2 charger and LIO board/flex?

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message: It was Magsafe2 charger. It works with another one. The problem was very strange. The charger works without problems when MBA is in sleep mode or while working, but not if laptop is shut down.

threads.title: Magsafe orange light turns off when MBA turns off
threads.message: What is the voltage on a full charged battery for <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>? Is it about 8.5V?
